about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated

The pack includes:

  • “Pirate missile bundle”
  • “Pirate weapons bundle”
  • “Pirate ammunition bundle”
  • Paint: “Lemon smoke”
  • Decor: “Steel jaws”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

The pack includes:
  • Pirate missiles: 30 pcs.
  • “Death star”
  • “Anomaly torpedo”
  • “Anchor mine”
  • “Repair rockets”
  • “Inhibitor missiles”
  • “Heavy repelling drone”
  • “Cluster rockets”

Weapons:
  • “Pirate pulse laser”
  • “Boarding coil mortar”
  • “Pirate ion emitter”
  • “Pirate positron cannon”
  • “Pirate shrapnel cannon”
  • “Pirate Gauss cannon”

Pirate ammunition: 30 pcs.
  • “Piercing charges”
  • “Lens system”
  • “Boosted charges”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Paint: “Lemon smoke”
  • Decor: “Steel jaws”

Special bonus for everyone who buys the pack — Premium license for 30 days!
When purchasing multiple DLCs, the time of premium licenses is cumulative.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated

The pack includes:

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 30 days!

name: Star Conflict - Classic Pirate Weapon Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Star Conflict - Classic Pirate Weapon Pack - $16.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Star Conflict - Classic Pirate Weapon Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
